install.name: Contacts
install.author: ARTIO s.r.o.
install.description: Adds SEO support for Contacts component.

param.name: ignoreSource
param.label: Ignore multiple sources:
param.description: You can choose to override the default behaviour of this option.

param.name: itemid
param.label: Itemid handling:
param.description: You can choose to override the default behaviour with your own Itemid.

param.name: overrideId
param.label: Override Itemid:
param.description: Itemid to always use with this component. Leave blank to use the default one.

param.name: contactid
param.label: Add contact ID to URL:
param.description: If set to Yes, contact ID will be prepended to contact name.

param.name: category
param.label: Add category to contact links:
param.description: If set to Yes, category name will be added before contact name in links to contacts.

param.name: categoryid
param.label: Add category ID to URL:
param.description: If set to Yes, category ID will be prepended to category name.
